Hit (empty).description: Renders as "Hit: ". Do not use any text in it as it will not show up.

body: {@chance ${1:% of success: 'a roll higher than 100 minus this value'}|$TM_SELECTED_TEXT|${2:rolled by name}|${3:on success text}|${4:on failure text}}

Coin Flip.description: Make a coin flip with custom face names/outcomes

Damage roll.description: Rolls for damage, with an XdY format (can use arithmetic operators)

Dice roll.description: A general dice roll, with an XdY format (can use arithmetic operators)

Note text.description: Note text, renders italicised with a faded grey look

Sense tag.description: Tags a sense type, to show an explanation on hover

Skill tag.description: Tags a skill type, to show an explanation on hover

Adventure tag.description: Tags an adventure, or a specific chapter/section of it

Book tag.description: Tags a book, or a specific chapter/section of it

Footnote text.description: Adds an inline footnote to the text, to be shown on hover

Link.description: Converts a url into an external hyperlink, with an optional display text

Color text.description: Colors the text using the chosen hex code

Code text.description: Formats the text as monospaced font

Area tag.description: Tags an area within a book/adventure. The modifiers are a combination of "x" for e[x]act text, removing the leading "area" prepended to the name, and "u" for [u]ppercase, capitalizing the prepended "area"

Action tag.description: Tags an action. Source is assumed to be PHB

Background tag.description: Tags a background. Source is assumed to be PHB

Boon tag.description: Tags a boon. Source is assumed to be MTF

Character creation option tag.description: Tags a character creation option. Source is assumed to be MOT

Class tag.description: Tags a character creation option. Source is assumed to be PHB

Condition tag.description: Tags a condition. Source is assumed to be PHB

Creature tag.description: Tags a creature. Source is assumed to be MM

Cult tag.description: Tags a cult. Source is assumed to be MTF

Disease tag.description: Tags a disease. Source is assumed to be DMG

Feat tag.description: Tags a feat. Source is assumed to be PHB

Hazard tag.description: Tags a hazard. Source is assumed to be DMG

Item tag.description: Tags an item. Source is assumed to be DMG

Language tag.description: Tags a language. Source is assumed to be PHB

Object tag.description: Tags an object. Source is assumed to be DMG

Optional feature tag.description: Tags an invocation or other optional feature. Source is assumed to be PHB

Psionics tag.description: Tags psionics. Source is assumed to be UATheMysticClass

Race tag.description: Tags a race. Source is assumed to be PHB

Recipe tag.description: Tags a recipe. Source is assumed to be HF (Heroes' Feast)

Reward tag.description: Tags a reward. Source is assumed to be DMG

Vehicle tag.description: Tags a vehicle. Source is assumed to be GoS

Vehicle upgrade tag.description: Tags a vehicle upgrade. Source is assumed to be GoS

Spell tag.description: Tags a spell. Source is assumed to be PHB

Table tag.description: Tags a table. Source is assumed to be DMG

Trap tag.description: Tags a trap. Source is assumed to be DMG

Variant rule tag.description: Tags a variant rule. Source is assumed to be DMG

Deity tag.description: Tags a variant rule. Source is assumed to be PHB, Faerûnian pantheon

Class feature tag.description: Tags a class feature. Class source is assumed to be PHB, feature source is assumed to be the same as class source

Subclass feature tag.description: Tags a subclass feature. Class and subclass source are assumed to be PHB, feature source is assumed to be the same as subclass source

Homebrew tag.description: The homebrew tag can show changes and modifications on hover

5eTools tag.description: Links within the same base site url, use for links to the site

Loader tag.description: Loads homebrew files. e.g. "creature/Kobold Press; Tome of Beasts.json". The URL after the pipe is assumed to be from the root of the homebrew repository, unless it starts with a "...://" prefix (i.e., any link should work, but there's a shorthand for homebrew repository links).

Attack tag.description: Bestiary 'attack' tags: Melee Attack:, Ranged Attack:, Melee or Ranged Attack:, Melee Weapon Attack:, Ranged Weapon Attack:, Melee Spell Attack:, Ranged Spell Attack:; (homebrew only) Area Attack:, Area Weapon Attack. These can be combined with commas.
